name: Spacebound (itch)
description:
Spacebound is a cooperative platformer where you work together to escape from the asteroid belt you crashed into. You swing from asteroid to asteroid ascending. How far can you go?

Controls

Player 1: A and D to swing. S to toggle grab. W to activate jet-pack.

Player 2: up and down arrows to swing. Bottom arrow to toggle grab. Up arrow to activate jet-pack.
